__e: I feel like I'm running out of ways to explain this to you, but once more I shall try.
I already did that. I can't totally explain it, but I have to go and see him.

Look, I don't know how else to say this, but none of you are capable of understanding this on the same level that I do. And Zelenka, that includes you.
And I can't explain it... but there's something about the way he's saying it.
I know it doesn't make any sense, and I can't explain it, but I know what I saw!

Yes, it is, and it must have been hard on you. ...to explain it to a three year old.
